translations.generate_password_desc: Generate strong passwords using random password generator
translations.long_desc: The longer a password, the more secure it is. A strong password should be at least 10 characters long.
translations.complex_desc: Strong passwords use a combination of letters, numbers, cases, and symbols to form an unpredictable string of characters that doesn't resemble words or names.
translations.unique_desc: A strong password should be unique to each account to reduce vulnerability in the event of a hack.
translations.contact_description: I am developing the project, I am open to your ideas.
translations.google_chrome_extension_desc: Chrome extension will come soon, my work continues
